hero.headline: Safe, non-production operational replicas for regulated SMB ops leaders
hero.subheadline: We build safe, non-production operational replicas so SMB ops leaders in regulated environments understand workflows faster, demo automation safely, and make clearer decisions with human-in-the-loop controls, clear approval gates, and audit trails by default before touching production.

whatYouGet: Knowledge base that answers with citations
Weekly metrics report (latency, deflection, routing accuracy)

deliverables.title: Decision map (workflow truth)
deliverables.description: A clear map of decisions, handoffs, and exceptions across priority workflows.

deliverables.title: Data + context inventory
deliverables.description: Sources, rules, and context required to make decisions defensible.

deliverables.title: Microcosm (synthetic facsimile)
deliverables.description: A scrubbed sandbox version of the workflow for safe simulation.

deliverables.title: Simulation scenarios
deliverables.description: What-if tests that show how changes affect time, risk, and cost.

deliverables.title: Governance + HITL guardrails
deliverables.description: Audit-ready controls, escalation paths, and human oversight points.

deliverables.title: Executive walkthrough + roadmap
deliverables.description: Clear outcomes, decisions to make next, and a prioritized path forward.
